text: Ni bu hui faxian quexin an la he mori de minzhong, hui yu weikang an la he shizhe de ren xiangqin xiang'ai, jishi na deng ren shi tamen de fuqin, huo erzi, huo xiongdi, huo qinqi. Zhe deng ren, an la ceng jiang zhengxin mingke zai tamen de xin shang, bingqie yi cong ta jiangxia de jingshen yuanzhu tamen. Ta jiang shi tamen ru xia lin zhu he de leyuan, er yong ju qizhong.
